title: Week 1 Recap
itunes:title: Week 1 Recap
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, & Marc Sessler – recap all the games from the first Sunday of the regular season including the Rams stomping on the Colts and the Detroit Lions comeback win against the Arizona Cardinals. Then the heroes break down the Sunday Night Football game where the Cowboys came for revenge against the Giants, stealing a win unlike their week 1 match-up last year.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
